articles.title: Man admits to posing as Caucasian on dating app to get nude pictures before extorting victims for sex - The Straits Times
articles.description: Ong Chun Siang threatened to expose the images when the women ignored him or rejected his requests for sexual favours.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:

articles.title: Asian shares stem recent losses, attention on cenbank tapering - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rallied on Friday after two days of losses, but were still in a nervous mood as global investors grapple with how best to interpret central banks' cautious moves to end stimulus, which also left currency markets quiet.
